alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Pipestone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 03 at 8:47PM CST until December 04 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one half mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Lincoln and Pipestone Counties. In South Dakota, Moody, Minnehaha, Turner, Lincoln, Yankton and Clay Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...With temperatures below freezing, dense freezing fog may create slick conditions on untreated surfaces, especially bridges which cool faster than surrounding roadways.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
